name: FPlayerMappableKeyQueryOptions
doc:
Options when querying what keys are mapped to a specific action on the player mappable
key profile.

MappingName: The mapping name to search for
KeyToMatch: If specified, then this key will be used to match against when checking if the key types and axis are the same.
SlotToMatch: The key slot that will be required to match if set. By default this is EPlayerMappableKeySlot::Unspecified, which will not filter by the slot at all.
RequiredDeviceType: If set, then only player mappings whose hardware device identifier that has the same primary input device type will be included in the results of this query
RequiredDeviceFlags: If set, then only player mappings whose Hardware Device Identifier that has the same flags as this will be included in the results
bMatchBasicKeyTypes: If true, then only keys that have the same value for IsGamepadKey, IsTouch, and IsGesture will be included in the results of this query
bMatchKeyAxisType: If true, then only keys that have the same value of IsAxis1D, IsAxis2D, and IsAxis3D will be included in the results of this query
